masterGrammar.rule: rule {VP option conj - conjoined VPs} VP = (InitConj) VP_1 Conj VP_2 <VP head> = <VP_1 head> <Conj head type conjoins_IP> = + <VP conjoined> = + <VP_1 conjoined> = - |limit recursion <VP option> = conj

rule {VP option 0a - Aux initial, VP complement} VP = Aux VP_1 <VP head> = <VP_1 head> <VP head type auxiliary> = + <Aux head type negative> = - <VP head type prefix> <= <Aux head type prefix> <VP option> = 0a

rule {VP option 0b - Aux final, VP complement} VP = VP_1 Aux <VP head> = <VP_1 head> <VP head type auxiliary> = + <Aux head type negative> = - <VP head type suffix> <= <Aux head type suffix> <VP option> = 0b

rule {VP option 0c - Aux only for non-root copular questions} VP = Aux <VP head> = <Aux head> <Aux head type negative> = - <VP head type copular> = + <VP head type question> = + <VP head type root> = - <VP option> = 0c

rule {VP option 1a - manner AdvP initial, adjoined to VP} VP = AdvP VP_1 <VP head> = <VP_1 head> <AdvP head type manner> = + <AdvP head type negative> = - <VP head type prefix> <= <AdvP head type prefix> <VP option> = 1a

rule {VP option 1b - manner AdvP final, adjoined to VP} VP = VP_1 AdvP <VP head> = <VP_1 head> <AdvP head type manner> = + <AdvP head type negative> = - <VP head type suffix> <= <AdvP head type suffix> <VP option> = 1b
rule {VP option 1c - split CP relative clause adjoined to VP} VP = VP_1 CP <VP head> = <VP_1 head> <CP head type relative> = + <VP head type suffix> <= <CP head type suffix> <VP option> = 1c
rule {VP option 1d - split IP relative clause adjoined to VP} VP = VP_1 IP <VP head> = <VP_1 head> <IP head type relative> = + <VP head type suffix> <= <IP head type suffix> <VP option> = 1d
rule {VP option 2a - V initial/final, intransitive} VP = V <VP head> = <V head> <V head type transitive> = - <V head type copular> = - <V head type passive> = - <VP option> = 2a

rule {VP option 2b - VSO order, intransitive} VP = V DP <VP head> = <V head> <V head type transitive> = - <V head type copular> = - <V head subject> = <DP> <VP head type pro-drop> = - <V head type passive> = - <DP head type suffix poss> = - | only in possessor position <DP head type prefix poss> = - <DP head type prefix copular> = - | only in no V/Aux copulars <DP head type suffix copular> = - {<VP head type question> = - /<VP head type question> = + <VP head fronted cat> = AdvP /<VP head type question> = + <VP head fronted> = none } <VP head type suffix> <= <DP head type suffix> <VP option> = 2b

rule {VP option 2bNeg - VSO order, intransitive, neg subj requires neg verb} VP = V DP <VP head> = <V head> <V head type transitive> = - <V head type copular> = - <V head subject> = <DP> <VP head type pro-drop> = - <V head type passive> = - <DP head type suffix poss> = - | only in possessor position <DP head type prefix poss> = - <DP head type prefix copular> = - | only in no V/Aux copulars <DP head type suffix copular> = - {<VP head type question> = - /<VP head type question> = + <VP head fronted cat> = AdvP /<VP head type question> = + <VP head fronted> = none } <VP head type suffix> <= <DP head type suffix> <VP head> == [subject:[head:[type:[negative:+]]]] -> | if subject negative, verb must be [type:[negative:+]] <VP option> = 2bNeg

rule {VP option 2bi - VSO/OSV order, intransitive, imperative} VP = V <VP head> = <V head> <VP head infl mood imperative> = + <V head type transitive> = - <V head type copular> = - <V head type passive> = - <VP head type question> = - <VP option> = 2bi
